template:
You are an expert system diagram evaluator. Please assess the quality of the following candidate netlist descriptions generated for the attached image.

[CANDIDATES]
{candidate_answers}

Please evaluate each candidate based on the following criteria:
1. Components (40 points): Are all components in the image correctly identified?
2. Connections (60 points): Are all connections (especially arrows) accurately captured?

For each candidate, provide a score between 0-100 and explain your reasoning. Identify the best candidate and state why it's superior.

Your evaluation should focus on how accurately each description matches the actual components and connections visible in the image.
